tool_description: Lookup the details of an address within The Netherlands. By entering a postcode and house number, you get the street, city, province, lattitude and longitude.
name: NL Address Lookup
title: NL Address Lookup

api_list.name: Address
api_list.description: Look up the details of a Dutch address

required_parameters.name: postcode
required_parameters.description: The full postcode in the format 1234AB

required_parameters.name: house_number
required_parameters.description: The full house number, starting with a digit. E.g. 10 or 25B
